programme.desc: Las vidas de varios jóvenes mexicanos se cruzan durante su estancia en una casa en Acapulco. Con ellos, las historias de amor, fiestas y diversión están aseguradas.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Comienzan las vacaciones y en el primer día en la casa shore se reúnen los viejos y nuevos integrantes para comenzar unas vacaciones de locura. El regreso a la casa original parece tener efecto en sus habitantes y los nuevos romances.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Luego de una primera noche salvaje, los Shore deciden pasar una tarde tranquila en la playa en donde aprovechan para hablar de lo sucedido la noche anterior y conocerse mejor. Llega la noche, los tragos, la fiesta y comienza la competencia.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Llega el nuevo "Boss" a la casa y los Shore descubren que sus obligaciones no son nada parecidas a lo que esperaban. Después de un día de trabajo nada mejor que unos drinks y lo que parecía una fiesta tranquila, termina en una noche de locura.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Luego del accidente de Fernando, Potro decide acompañarlo al hospital y las consecuencias de su caída no se hacen esperar. Una vez más llega el "Boss" a la casa para enviar a los Shore a un nuevo trabajo.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Comienza un nuevo día en la casa Shore y la llegada del Boss emociona a casi todos los integrantes de las casa quienes salen a disfrutar de un nuevo y divertido día laboral. Al caer la noche los Shore deciden ir a un sitio más tranquilo.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Una invitada colombiana llega a la casa shore mientras Fernando tiene que irse de Acapulco para ver a su medico y decidir si puede terminar sus vacaciones en familia. Todo esta listo para la iniciación de los nuevos integrantes de la casa.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Erick llega a la casa Shore e inmediatamente empieza el coqueteo con una de las nuevas integrantes. La fiesta comienza y las comadres deciden pasar el día esposadas. Por fin llega la iniciación de los nuevos integrantes.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Cintia cada vez aguanta menos la actitud de las comadres y decide terminar sus vacaciones. Una vez mas llega el boss y les anuncia que su próximo trabajo va a ser en Chihuahua.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: The Shore gang is ready for vacation. This time, the most dysfunctional family on TV is back in Acapulco, the birthplace of the crew. Parties, drama, romance, and heartbreak will break out in this beautiful port.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: The party continues and the Captain stirs up trouble in the house. The tension between Isa and Fernanda boils over and takes an unexpected turn. Nacha joins in and Isa's reaction surprises everyone in the house.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: The Boss makes his first appearance in the house and gives them a surprise. The Shore gang finds out there is a club in the house. Couples are formed and things start to heat up. The relationship between Alba and Fer grows stronger.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: The Shore gang is still at the beach. Karime admits she likes Diego, but she thinks Nacha likes him too. On their way home, many things happen: Dance battles, heated arguments, and tears. The gang is rowdy. Crisis breaks out in Team Tendo.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Team Tendo thinks Karime is reaching 15 years of artistic career, so the Shore gang decides to celebrate it their way: Drinking, kissing, arguing, and dancing the waltz with the birthday girl.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster makes Easy Steak Frites, and Toni Tipton-Martin shares the origin of french fries. Equipment expert Adam Ried shares his top pick for braisers. Bryan Roof makes French Onion Soup.

programme.title: Cook's Country

programme.title: Cook's Country

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Sure, raw tomato sauces are fast, but if the sauce is watery and bland, who cares? Likewise, asparagus-based pasta sauces are often bland and boring. In this episode, we keep things simple while avoiding these common problems.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen prepares two Indian favorites: chicken biryani and mulligatawny soup.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pissaladière is Provençal street food, a fragrant, pizza-like tart prized for its contrast of salty black olives and anchovies against a backdrop of sweet caramelized onions and thyme. We figure out how to make a great version of this French classic.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Too often, eggplant Parmesan is a soggy, oily mess. And pasta with chicken and broccoli is heavy and bland. But after many tests in the kitchen, we've come up with recipes that give these simple, honest dishes the respect they deserve.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta all' amatriciana is perhaps Rome's most famous dish. Despite the fancy name, it's nothing more than long-strand pasta sauced with tomatoes, onion, bacon, and hot pepper flakes and dusted with cheese. We show you how to master this simple dish.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Osso buco, literally "bone with a hole," is the Italian term for veal shanks. This meaty cut, akin to beef shanks or lamb shanks, becomes meltingly tender when stewed for several hours in a covered pot. We serve it with a simple and satisfying polenta.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our goal was simple: Take French onion soup and baked goat cheese salad and make stellar versions of these bistro favorites.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A sticky bun should be neither dense nor bready, neither saturated with butter nor so sugary that it makes your heart race. The crumb should be tender and feathery and the sticky glaze gently chewy and gooey. Here's how we made ours.

programme.desc: Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his interview with Heather & Brian, feuding parents over 15-yr-old son Brandon's death. Hear from Brandon's friends, the last to see him alive and two of the young men make shocking allegations against Heather. How does she respond?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Christi says she was an Emmy-winning TV news reporter at the top of her career, but now her struggle with alcohol has left her jobless, homeless and estranged from her two adult daughters. Christi faces her girls for the first time in more than two years.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: It's Ask Dr. Phil day. Is it an attractive woman's responsibility to tone down her looks on the job? Debrahlee made headlines saying she was fired for being too pretty. She says she was told her figure, pencil skirts & 3-inch heels were too distracting.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Samantha & sister Sarah say mom, Stacy, is a successful teacher & behaviorist, but when it comes to 33-year-old brother, Ben, it's another story. Stacy says teaching Ben how to pay bills and to eat his veggies helps Ben. Ben says he's just stuck in a rut.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Summer Wells, 5, vanished from her Tennessee home, June 15, 2021. Parents Don & Candus claim abduction; online bullies say the opposite. Don & Candus meet with Scott Rouse & Greg Hartley, body language experts who work with the FBI, police and military.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Warren Jeffs, leader of the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints & self-proclaimed prophet, was on the FBI's 10 Most Wanted Fugitives for unlawful flight & sexual conduct with a minor. Dr. Phil talks with FLDS member Willie Jessop.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Cassie insists her teen daughter's behavior is the root cause of her family's dysfunction, not Jonah, her drug & alcohol-addicted husband. Dr. Phil presents Cassie with a difficult choice: pick your children or pick your husband. What will Cassie decide?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jana & Allen say neighbors Maritha & Melanie moved into the neighborhood: police reports, DFS, threats & their 4 dogs bark all hours of the night! Maritha & Melanie point to Jana & Allen, with Melanie being charged with misconduct for mooning a neighbor!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Robin & Daniel, both want custody of daughters, Dani, 14, & Zoey, 12, who've been torn between both parents for years. What will happen to Dani and Zoey? Find out as we meet the whole family,to see if they are ready to receive help and move forward.Pt. 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dan & Teresa say identical twin sons, Dallas & Drew, 16, are violent, destructive & dangerous. What's at the root of the teens' anger & extreme jealousy? Dr. Phil examines the jealousy & torment driving these siblings apart & throwing the home into chaos.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Have you ever looked in the mirror and thought, "If I could lose five more pounds, I'd be perfect"? Darlene and Jennifer have been starving themselves in the name of perfection, but are they also killing themselves on their quest?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Shelby wants to find the truth about her dad's online relationship with a woman he's never met. Dad David says "Maria" has a $10 million inheritance and says he knows for a fact that "Maria" is a real person and he can't wait to introduce her one day.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed "fat guy" Eric was 560 lbs, so he decided to go on an epic bike ride across America. His goals were to lose weight, write a book & repair his relationship with his wife. His story went viral, as critics said Eric was scamming America.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues with the family of Amy, "Mother God", who says she can heal the world with her group, Love Has Won. The family alleges that Amy is a brainwashed "cult leader" and she is putting other people's lives at risk. Pt. 2

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, it's an all-new Cookbook Club with "Half Baked Harvest" author Tieghan Gerard who is whipping up Finish Spicy Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Poker Face" star Natasha Lyonne is telling Drew about her new show, her partnership with Maya Rudolph and whether she would do an "American Pie" reboot.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Preppy Kitchen: Recipes for Seasonal Dishes and Simple Pleasures" cookbook author John Kanell joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk for Drew's News: Food Edition.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Julio Torres is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover today's hottest headlines. Then, deleted scenes from this season's Drewber rides. Drew and Ross are celebrating national pie day.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are hitting the headlines covering a new middle seat airplane lottery and whether hearing birds can help boost your mood.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Renowned OBGYN Dr. Suzanne Gilberg-Lenz is answering burning questions about sexual health including activities that could affect male fertility.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Icon Martha Stewart and Drew tackle relationship red flags at the news desk and Martha reveals which young star she simply adores.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Chef Ronnie Woo is cooking up a storm with co-host Ross Mathews. Then, Drew and Ross discuss some of the latest and greatest headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Office" star Rainn Wilson is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover topics like the surprising reason Kate Winslet has a hard time re-watching herself in "Titanic".

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Bronwyn Tarboton is sharing some genius upcycling tips including how to create home décor out of items in your trash.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Long Island Medium" star Theresa Caputo is chatting with Drew about her work as a medium, the show and more. She's also doing a special reading of the studio audience.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Rob Riggle joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover topics like the news of a potential "Dumb and Dumber 3" and the couple that opted for mashed potato powder instead of rice at their wedding.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Tamera Mowry Housley opens up about sharing her spicy to-do list with her husband in her new memoir, "You Should Sit Down For This!," the possibility of a "Sister, Sister" reboot and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Dictator Lunches" author Jenny Mollen joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk covering everything from Ashton Kutcher and wife Mila Kunis's no closed-door policy to a mom who went viral for changing her son's name at 18-months.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives" host Guy Fieri is joining Drew to chat and play a game! Dating expert Damona Hoffman is joining Drew, Ross Mathews and his husband Wellington Garciato talk about love and soulmates.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Kiera Knightley and Carrie Coon join Drew to talk about their upcoming film, "Boston Strangler."Drew and her co-pilotRoss Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Danny DeVito is playing a round of behind the scenes and sharing tidbits from some of his biggest roles.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: A year ago, actress Dylan Mulvaney publicly came out as a trans woman for the first time and began documenting her transition in her Tik-Tok series "Days of Girlhood," that now has over a billion views.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Dear Edward" star Taylor Schilling is chatting about her new series based on the bestselling novel and showing off her drawing skills with a round of "Drew it or Blew it.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: RuPaul's Drag Race" host RuPaul is talking about the show and helping Drew come up with her drag name!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, Celebrity Hair Stylist Chris Appleton is transforming three viewers with hair makeovers.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up and covering topics like the study that found many single people don't think they'll find "the one".

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: CBS Mornings Co-Hosts Gayle King, Tony Dokoupil and Nate Burleson join Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk breaking down everything.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are hitting the headlines in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathewsare covering the news including headlines like the study that found mammals who have friends live longer and the ice cream shop in D.C. serving everyone, even those who can't pay! Pilar Valdesis back with a new Pro Tips with Pilar.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Bel-Air" star Jabari Banks is joining Drew to chat about his show. Drew and her co-pilot Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Renfield" star Nicholas Hoult is telling Drew all about working with Nicholas Cage, his role in "The Menu" and why he's baffled by American salads.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts still don't realize that Mr. Pinckney is their butler instead of their boarder. When he tries to leave them Granny thinks he trying to skip without paying his rent.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Hospitalized for nerves from dealing with the hillbillies Mrs. Drysdale threatens Mr. Drysdale to stay there until he gets rid of them and even sending for a specialist. Unfortunately, the Clampet clan is on their way to visit her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale wakes up to find she is no longer in the hospital. The Clampetts, unhappy with what they feel as the hospital's poor level of care, break her out and set her up in their mansion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly May goes to Jed's studio to be in a movie and meet a potential husband.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Ellie May loses another suitor to Miss Jane in another case of mistaken identity.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After the Clampetts accidentally run into a beatnik he moves into the Clampett mansion, but neither he nor they know what to make of each other.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: As a favor to Jed Mr. Drysdale arranges for a playboy bank director (who normally only dates women half his age) to come court Granny, while Jed goes out with a beautiful woman who dates rich older men.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants Jed to find a wife and asks for Mr. Drysdale's help. He introduces Jed to Phyllis but learns too late she a gold digger and becomes alarmed when they head to the track. But it's Granny they need to worry about.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to become a "double naught" spy and converts the family's truck into his idea of a Bondmobile. But he becomes the unwitting pawn in another banker's scheme.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale's biggest rival John Cushing succeeds in getting the Clampetts to transfer all of their money to his bank.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drydale's poodle Claude is to enter a dog show but gets sick right before. Granny offers to doctor the dog but Ellie Mae is concerned he doesn't know any tricks so she decides to help out with one of her own pets.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: John Brewster, the oilman from Tulsa, is bringing his new bride to California for their honeymoon. Somehow the Clampetts get the idea that their backyard rustic cabin is the ideal place for the Brewsters to stay.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, the Countess returns for Granny's new batch of spring tonic. Granny thinks she's looking for a new husband and that Jed is her perfect match.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale owns a building that houses a beatnik's club. He hopes to get rid of them when they can't pay their rent but they find a new a sponsor: Jed Clampett.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed soon regrets helping out the beatniks with their money problems when Jethro, Elly May (and even Granny!) decide to join them.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale is appalled to learn that Jed is going door-to-door peddling his services as a handyman. But then he's apoplectic when he discovers that Jed has been hired by a rival bank.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A long time employee of the Commerce Bank is being forcibly retired to make way for a new computer system. A chance meeting with the Clampetts gives him an idea about dealing with Mr. Drysdale.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Beauregard Short arrives in Beverly Hills from back home. Everyone assumes he's looking for a wife and Jethro decides to show him how to be like him, an international playboy.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Brewster, the oil man who made Jed a multi-millionaire, arrives in Beverly Hills with his wife planning to build their dream house. Jed and Granny think they have the perfect house in mind for their dream home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is determined to go back home even if she has to walk back all by herself. When she reaches Las Vegas she has second thoughts. Jethro gets arrested by an undercover cop.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale thinks she has a new way of getting rid of the Clampetts: talk Jed into donating their mansion to the city for an art museum. They agree, on the assumption that they are supposed to provide the artworks and not move out.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny confuses Mrs. Drysdale's forays into astrology with the practice of black magic. An intended gift for Ellie Mae from Mr. Drysdale only adds to the confusion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is anxious to become a new "Double Naught" spy and Mr. Drysdale gives him his own office. A bank robber hopes to con an unwitting Jethro into helping him get into the bank vault.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When the Clampetts decide they want to go home for Possum Day, Mr. Drysdale attempts to put together a Possum Day in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro thinks the Drysdale's young attractive maid is interested in him. He commences to courting her but she is actually interested in watching the football game on the Clampett's color TV.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts (thereafter Mr. Drysdale) mistake the new neighbor's maidservant for the actual owner. Granny tries her best to set Jed up with her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's concocts a love potion for Elly Mae at the same time Mr. Drysdale hires an escort for Elly. Dean arrives at the mansion with the Clampetts believing he's Miss Jane's boyfriend so Granny tries a reverse spell.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E001) Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E002) Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E003) Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E004) Brandon is visited by his ex-girlfriend Sheryl but, when she meets Dylan, she's quickly star-struck by his money and glamor.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E005) When Brandon tries out for the basketball team, he's angered to learn that his main rival is from another district.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E006) An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E007) "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E008) The Walsh parents examine their relationship while Brenda and Brandon examine theirs, as they get involved in a UCLA study on twins.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E009) Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E010) The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Either Jag or Blue will be evicted, or will they? Because one of the four Houseguests you chose to compete for the BB Power of Invincibility will win the chance to save an evicted Houseguest. Who will play? Who will win? And will they stop

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Every houseguest competes for the most important Head of Household so far. Who will win power, and who will they target?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will the Power of Veto save one of the Chillers from the hot seat, and if so who will become Jared's next target?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will eviction history repeat itself for Jag, or will the chillbillie be left out in the cold? Plus, who will become the next Head of Household?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Humila Week is under way and the space cowboy is in control. Will Cameron cause chaos and shake up the house?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: The Power of Veto is on the line, with special guest host Josh Duhamel. Will the golden power save one of the nominees, and will Cameron shock the house by backdooring Cirie?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: One of Cirie's top allies exits the game, but will it be who she expects? Plus, the Head of Household is on the line in the iconic Wall Competition and the Houseguests come face-to-face with a legendary meatball.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Who will conquer the wall and become the new Head of Household, and which houseguest will be targeted for eviction? Plus witness the war of words that blew the house apart before Izzys departure.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Who will win the Power of Veto, and will the plan to get Cameron on the block succeed?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will Cameron finally be evicted from the House? Who will follow? A terrifying Double Eviction kicks off Scary Week, a full week of gameplay and one night of fright. Plus, a scary ending that will send shivers down the spines of all who survive.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Jared and Cameron return from the grave as BB zombies, how will the house react to this spine-tingling twist? Plus witness all the crazy drama you didn't see during the death-defying double.

programme.title: Big Brother

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Maldito
programme.desc: Cuando un mafioso local es asesinado a tiros en su auto, Danny y Báez intentan obtener información del chico de los recados de bajo nivel de la mafia que encuentran atado en el maletero antes de que la pandilla tome represalias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Viejos tiempos
programme.desc: Cuando el primer socio de Frank anuncia sus planes de publicar un libro lleno de historias de sus primeros días en la policía, a Frank le preocupa que sus historias personales se hagan públicas.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A sangre fría
programme.desc: Cuando un teniente de la policía de Nueva York, recientemente retirado y bien considerado, es acusado de disparar a un grupo de posibles asaltantes en el metro y posteriormente desaparece, Frank debe enfrentar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Music City

programme.desc: Jackson tries to take things slow with Jessica until unexpected temptations drive him back to his old ways. When Rachyl receives a text from an ex, her past threatens to derail her present. Alexandra competes in the Miss Tennessee USA Pageant.

programme.desc: Jackson has to decide if he's ready for a serious relationship with Jessica, or if pageant girl Savana is more his speed. Rachyl struggles to tell Kerry about a recent text exchange with an Ex who just moved back to Nashville.

programme.desc: Jackson might be biting off more than he can chew when he decides to perform live, and Kerry progresses his music career when he connects with another singer.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/19/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores Libyan hip-hop, Italian restaurants and post-war uncertainty, by examining the country through personal stories, food and music.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 06/02/2013. Bourdain and his friend, world-renowned chef Eric Ripert, move from hip, modern Lima back in time into pre-Columbian Peru.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 06/09/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Congo, the setting of one of his favorite books, Conrad’s “Heart of Darkness.”

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 09/22/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Andalucia during Semana Santa, Holy Week, to visit longtime director Zach Zamboni, who currently lives in Granada.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/14/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores one of the most fabled and beautiful areas of Asia: Myanmar, the city of Yangon and the remote Bagan temple.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/21/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Koreatown in Los Angeles, where he finds a tight-knit community marked by the 1992 Rodney King riots.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/05/2013. Chefs and restauranteurs Fred Morin and Dave McMillan, of Joe Beef’s, take us across Canada by rail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man wrecks his friend's car while fleeing police, detectives arrest a man wanted for armed robbery and attempted murder, and officers spy a subject who eluded them earlier.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man riding a bike at night with no lights decides to take off rather than talk with police, and a dangerous domestic dispute unfolds on the streets of Texas.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. An intoxicated prowler is reported after a woman spots him in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man complains of heart trouble after running from police, a suspect in a stolen car leads officers on a wild chase, and police check on a disabled vehicle and its occupants.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A chatty motorist becomes agitated when officers start asking questions, a fleeing driver calls his wife in the middle of a pursuit, and deputies catch a man in a lie.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers arrest a couple during an argument over who the narcotics belong to. Police seize a large bag of marijuana after a routine stop. A man is caught harboring drugs under his tongue during questioning.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A patrol car en route to a call spooks a driver who then takes off at high speed, leading the officers to pursue him instead, and police investigate shots fired on a home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man on a motorcycle evades an officer, a woman in a suspicious vehicle accrues multiple charges, and a traffic stop reveals two men under the influence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A jumpy bicyclist mistakenly reveals more than he had planned, and officers search a darkened building in an attempt to thwart a robbery in progress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcyclist leads officers on a high-speed chase, a dead car battery won't stop a man from eluding the police, and a wanted driver fails to avoid an arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers arrest a suspect hoarding drugs inside a motel room. A driver admits to drug and alcohol use after being pulled over. Officers assist in the search for a runaway child.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Detectives stop a vehicle leaving a known drug house and find a loaded concealed gun while searching one of the passengers. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers stop a fleeing vehicle, and a man with a warrant learns that a doughnut shop is not the best place to hide from the police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An open container and crack pipe are discovered inside a teen's vehicle. Officers find a man at a nearby residence lifting weights after trying to evade police. A fight involving two men and a shovel is broken up.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Stop sticks are deployed to intercept a vehicle with bullets. Two suspects watch their life unravel after being found with meth. Police assist young and restless runaways.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Following a brief pursuit, the desperate driver bails out of the vehicle and flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault call. When a dog owner returns home, she's informed of her dog's mayhem and given a verbal warning and citation.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Oklahoma man's effort to evade units goes up in flames, officers use a beanbag gun on an armed suspect, and deputies intervene in a couple's grocery dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Officer attempts to pull over a car which leads to a high speed pursuit. An Officer encounters an apartment fire. A man is hit by a vehicle in a trailer park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A disturbed naked man is spotted in a park covered in blood. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man pulls out all the stops to elude the police, a civilian steps in when she spots a violent crime in progress, and a suspected shoplifter is confronted by officers.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A cyclist takes flight, police find a woman at the wheel of a stolen truck, and officers roll up on a couple smoking meth while their four-year-old is in the car with them.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When one of the officers attempts to grab a suspect, the suspect unexpectedly assaults the officer in an attempt to avoid arrest. An officer responds to a stabbing. An officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing child.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted man sprints across a freeway to evade police, a woman is arrested for breaking her friend's windows, and a driver tries to talk his way out of a road rage arrest.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate first-hand the behind-the-scenes action of Cirque du Soleil in order to determine what may have contributed to a young dancer's untimely death.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom is fascinated when every detail of a miniature is identical to that of a real crime scene, and he goes about trying to solve the case using the clues provided.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When an innocent man is brutally attacked and beaten to death by what looks like a monster in a black cape, the CSIs are called to investigate, only to learn that a similar attack took place minutes later.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a dead woman is found hanging from a cross inside a church, the team follows the evidence to uncover a bizarre love triangle dating all the way back to the victim's high school days.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When two young boys are reported missing, a known neighborhood sex offender is the primary suspect.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: While investigating an elderly woman's murder, Grissom receives a miniature crime scene replica; Greg attends a hearing to ascertain his culpability in a teenager's accidental death.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When identical twins are found dead, the evidence in both cases does not immediately prove a connection between the two deaths. However, as the CSIs dig deeper into the histories of the women, a surprising twist takes the investigation in a new direction.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate a string of murders in Las Vegas that may be tied to an infamous mob boss from the 1970s who disappeared many years ago.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When the CSIs process clues after a murder at a poultry manufacturing plant, the evidence leads them to the home of a man who collects miniature trains and other miniature paraphernalia.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine's testimony in court is not enough to convict a killer suspected of murdering his own mother. Adam Novak, with whom Catherine had a brief romantic encounter, is the lawyer who represents the killer and secures his freedom.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The lead suspect for the high-profile murder of anti-drug crusading assemblyman Danilo Zamesca is Thomas Simon, the west coast's biggest drug supplier.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: As Catherine and Keppler begin to investigate the murder of a teen-aged Jane Doe, both agree that the killer, who was meticulous in removing evidence from the body and its surrounding area, is likely a repeat offender.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A case involving a man's torched corpse whose bones and tissues had been harvested leads Nick and Keppler into the disturbing world of illegally sold human body parts.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom returns from his teaching sabbatical as new member of the team, Michael Keppler desperately tries to keep his dark past hidden from his colleagues.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando dos gemelas idénticas aparecen muertas, las pruebas en ambos casos no demuestran inmediatamente una conexión entre las dos muertes.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan una serie de asesinatos en Las Vegas que podrían estar relacionados con un infame jefe de la mafia de los años 70 que desapareció hace muchos años.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando los CSI procesan pistas tras un asesinato en una planta de fabricación de aves de corral, las pruebas les conducen a la casa de un hombre que colecciona trenes en miniatura y otra parafernalia en miniatura.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El testimonio de Catherine ante el tribunal no es suficiente para condenar a un asesino sospechoso de asesinar a su propia madre.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El principal sospechoso del sonado asesinato del asambleísta Danilo Zamesca es Thomas Simon, el mayor proveedor de drogas de la costa oeste.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Catherine y Keppler comienzan a investigar el asesinato de una desconocida adolescente, ambos coinciden en que el asesino, que fue meticuloso a la hora de eliminar pruebas del cadáver y sus alrededores, es probablemente reincidente.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un caso relacionado con el cadáver calcinado de un hombre cuyos huesos y tejidos habían sido extraídos lleva a Nick y Keppler al inquietante mundo de la venta ilegal de partes de cuerpos humanos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom regresa de su año sabático como profesor mientras el nuevo miembro del equipo Michael Keppler intenta desesperadamente mantener su oscuro pasado oculto a sus colegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Con potencialmente menos de un día para intentar evitar los próximos asesinatos, el equipo de CSI debe sacudirse rápidamente la sorpresa de que el verdadero asesino en miniatura no es el difunto Ernie Edward Dell.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La ocurrencia de Grissom de que dos jóvenes amantes desaparecidos pueden haber huido a México queda pronto anulada por el descubrimiento de gotas de sangre junto a la plaza de aparcamiento libre del chico en el instituto.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras procesa la casa donde fueron asesinadas varias coristas, Sara se ve atormentada por los ojos aterrorizados y las crípticas palabras moribundas de la sexta víctima que descubre.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Greg se ve obligado a enfrentarse de nuevo a la hostil madre y al hermano del matón al que mató en defensa propia hace varios meses cuando el equipo de CSI descubre que el hermano está implicado en un nuevo caso de asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras Grissom y el resto de los CSI están fuera investigando nuevos casos, Hodges hace creer a Archie, Henry, Mandy y Wendy que Grissom quiere que se unan en secreto esa noche para intentar resolver los cuatro casos de asesinos en miniatura.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: En su intento por identificar al asesino de un ex boxeador que vivía entre un grupo de prostitutas que lo detestaban, los CSI deben establecer cuál de los varios actos que pusieron en peligro su vida en una noche realmente lo mató.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a delivery truck driver and a housewife on his route are murdered, Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to find their connection.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner takes Natalia hostage and tells her a shocking secret about his crimes. Horatio Caine and the rest of CSI the team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine has decided to protect a mixed martial arts fighter from his dangerous brother who recently escaped from prison.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the CSIs find a co-ed dead in a hot tub, they investigate a case marked by jealousy, psychosis and college roommates.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When Horatio Caine chases down a mysterious murder suspect, he discovers that the man's entire life is an elaborate charade.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After Horatio captures the last prison escapee, their transport plane crash lands, and they discover the fugitive has more planned than a getaway.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and Natalia’s lives hang in the balance as Horatio stands between Natalia and certain death.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs are led into the sexy world of male gigolos when they uncover an unusual murder weapon.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A tornado touches down on a murder scene, damaging the evidence and putting Ryan and Walter in grave danger.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team chases a sadistic killer who takes women’s eyes, and a new nemesis challenges Horatio.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio protects a Mexican police chief from the mysterious assassin who killed her husband.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: In a deserted mansion, the CSIs find a body hanging that appears to have been killed by a vampire.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A high-stakes poker game is disrupted by a masked assassin, leaving one player dead and the CSIs baffled.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When Horatio finds another corpse with missing eyes, everything points to his nemesis, The Taunter – except he has an airtight alibi.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: Los tuyos, los míos, y los nuestros
programme.desc: Un almirante viudo de la Guardia costera y una viuda diseñadora de bolsos se enamoran y se casan, para la consternación de sus hijos, ocho de él y diez de ella.

programme.title: Legalmente rubias
programme.desc: Cuando dos primas británicas se mudan a Los Ángeles, se dan cuenta que para triunfar en la secundaria deben demostrar que las rubias no sólo se divierten más, sino que son más listas.

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica
programme.desc: Una mujer en sus treinta y tantos años se descubre a sí misma a través de la vida, el amor y el corazón roto.

programme.title: Las estafadoras
programme.desc: Una mujer y su hija son estafadoras profesionales que utilizan sus armas de seducción para engañar a millonarios, hasta que la joven hija se enamora poniendo en apuros el último golpe: un excéntrico magnate del tabaco.

programme.title: Enemigo al acecho
programme.desc: Dos francotiradores, uno ruso y uno alemán, juegan al gato y el ratón durante la Batalla de Stalingrado.

programme.title: El gran rescate
programme.desc: En medio de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el Batallón nro. 6 de exploradores recibe una misión de proporciones heroicas: ir 50 kilómetros tras las líneas enemigas y liberar a más de 500 prisioneros de guerra estadounidenses.

programme.title: Rescate al amanecer
programme.desc: Durante la guerra de Vietnam, el piloto americano, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale) es derribado y tomado prisionero por el Vietcong. Durante su cautiverio, le tocó vivir una de las experiencias más notables y horrorosas de toda la guerra.

programme.title: Busco novio para mi mujer
programme.desc: Arath de la Torre y Sandra Echeverría protagonizan una comedia sobre el plan de un esposo para poner fin a su infeliz matrimonio, para descubrir que incluso los mejores planes pueden resultar contraproducentes cuando se trata de amor.

programme.title: Todos queremos a alguien
programme.desc: Karla Souza interpreta a una joven doctora soltera en Los Ángeles quien está dividida entre dos amantes y dos posibles amores, en esta divertida comedia romántica bilingüe.

programme.title: Cásese quien pueda
programme.desc: Una comedia romántica sobre cómo la boda del siglo salió mal en todas las formas posibles.

programme.title: Aquí entre nos
programme.desc: Cansado de que su esposa y sus tres hijas lo tomen por sentado, Rodolfo Guerra se despierta una mañana y decide no ir a trabajar. Luego empieza la locura.

programme.title: Todo incluido
programme.desc: Una familia de vacaciones se ve obligada a esconderse en su habitación de hotel cuando un huracán arrasa el centro turístico, donde pronto empiezan a revelarse verdades que han permanecido ocultas durante mucho tiempo.

programme.title: Todos queremos a alguien
programme.desc: Karla Souza interpreta a una joven doctora soltera en Los Ángeles quien está dividida entre dos amantes y dos posibles amores, en esta divertida comedia romántica bilingüe.

programme.title: Cásese quien pueda
programme.desc: Una comedia romántica sobre cómo la boda del siglo salió mal en todas las formas posibles.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Anna Paquin protagoniza este thriller en el que caracteriza a una adolescente cuya vida cambia cuando su familia se muda a una nueva casa con secretos. Poco después una serie de sucesos sobrenaturales desencadenarán el mal que habita en la casa.

programme.title: Estación zombi
programme.desc: Una desgarradora película de terror y suspenso zombi, que sigue a un grupo de pasajeros aterrorizados que se abren camino a través de un brote viral en todo el país.

programme.title: Drácula 2000
programme.desc: El maestro del terror Wes Craven presenta una adaptación moderna y sexy del clásico thriller gótico. Luego de que Drácula despierta de su sueño de 100 años, su primer destino es Estados Unidos y la exótica ciudad de Nueva Orleans.

programme.title: Event Horizon: La nave de la muerte
programme.desc: En 2047, un equipo de astronautas se embarca en una misión para recuperar una nave espacial. Sin embargo, esta simple tarea los conducirá a algo mucho más aterrador de lo que imaginaban.

programme.title: Supernova: el fin del universo
programme.desc: En los confines del espacio, la tripulación de una nave desvelará un secreto antes de que una supernova haga estallar la galaxia. James Spader, Angela Bassett, Peter Facinelli y Robert Forster protagonizan este thriller de ciencia ficción.

programme.title: Drácula 2000
programme.desc: El maestro del terror Wes Craven presenta una adaptación moderna y sexy del clásico thriller gótico. Luego de que Drácula despierta de su sueño de 100 años, su primer destino es Estados Unidos y la exótica ciudad de Nueva Orleans.

programme.title: Event Horizon: La nave de la muerte
programme.desc: En 2047, un equipo de astronautas se embarca en una misión para recuperar una nave espacial. Sin embargo, esta simple tarea los conducirá a algo mucho más aterrador de lo que imaginaban.

programme.title: S.O.S. Hay un loco suelto en el espacio
programme.desc: El héroe espacial Lone Starr (Bill Pullman) y su amigo medio canino Barf (John Candy) están en una misión en su casa rodante voladora para salvar a la princesa Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) de Dark Helmet (Rick Moranis) en una parodia inspirada en Mel Brooks.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy protagoniza a un Norbit apacible, que recibe una segunda oportunidad con el amor de su infancia, Kate. Sin embargo, los obstáculos podrían complicar este romance más de lo esperado.

programme.title: La fuerza del amor
programme.desc: Jason Bateman es un ambicioso empresario a punto de vender su exitosa compañía de extractos de sabores hasta que ocurre un extraño accidente laboral. Con diálogos graciosos y comedia estrafalaria, se saborea un 100% de pura diversión.

programme.desc: El héroe espacial Lone Starr (Bill Pullman) y su amigo medio canino Barf (John Candy) están en una misión en su casa rodante voladora para salvar a la princesa Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) de Dark Helmet (Rick Moranis) en una parodia inspirada en Mel Brooks.

programme.desc: Murphy protagoniza a un Norbit apacible, que recibe una segunda oportunidad con el amor de su infancia, Kate. Sin embargo, los obstáculos podrían complicar este romance más de lo esperado.

programme.title: S.O.S. Hay un loco suelto en el espacio
programme.desc: El héroe espacial Lone Starr (Bill Pullman) y su amigo medio canino Barf (John Candy) están en una misión en su casa rodante voladora para salvar a la princesa Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) de Dark Helmet (Rick Moranis) en una parodia inspirada en Mel Brooks.

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Vera Cruz
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: The Big Country
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
programme.desc: Charles returns to Paris to reminisce about the life he led in Paris after it was liberated.

programme.title: Island In The Sky
programme.desc: Set after World War II, John Wayne plays Dooley, a former army pilot flying transport missions, who is forced to crash-land his fuel-starved plane on a frozen lake after it strays from its course.

programme.title: Donovan's Reef
programme.desc: Acclaimed director John Ford and screen legend John Wayne team up for what would be their final collaboration in this boisterous, rowdy South Seas escapade.

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa weaves the tale of her great, great grandmother, the Queen of the Gypsies, to explain a bizarre family tradition: a woman in her family must marry an American -- but only every fourth generation -- in order to gain a special inheritance.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After Oliver (Eddie Albert) accidentally drops a hammer on her head, Lisa (Eva Gabor) develops a case of amnesia, with no idea who she is or why she is on a farm in Hooterville…and she adamantly refuses to believe that Oliver is her husband!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Nothing gets done on the Douglas farm when Oliver (Eddie Albert) gifts Eb (Tom Lester) a top-of-the-line radio for his birthday. Letting nothing stop him, Eb (Tom Lester) enters a radio contest...even when Eleanor the cow swallows the radio whole.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa (Eva Gabor) is delighted to learn that her Hungarian mother is planning a visit to their little farm. Much to Oliver's (Eddie Albert) disbelief and dismay, a rumor spreads all around Hooterville that Lisa's mother is a European countess.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: It's a very official third season premiere for Green Acres when the retirement of a state senator leaves Hooterville considering its best candidate for the job. Of course, they turn to their beloved lawyer-come-farmer Oliver Douglas (Eddie Albert).

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver finds himself in a jam after asking Lisa to make him homemade fruit preserves. An episode deliciously devoted to Lisa's culinary escapades, Lisa musters all of her Hungarian might to make Oliver the best peach jam he's ever tasted.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After years of substandard service, Oliver is hellbent on throwing the book at the Hooterville Phone Company. When it becomes clear that the local utility oversight board can't do much about it, he decides to handle matters directly.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Mr. Trendell, the president of the Hooterville Phone Company, hands the company over to a delighted Oliver. But after a day of crossed wires and a switchboard repairman with some loose connections of his own, Oliver is ready to call it quits.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: For the first time, Oliver has a successful crop that needs picking. His tomatoes have grown beautifully. But matters at the phone company continue to divide his precious time, so Oliver looks for an interested buyer to take the company off his hands.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Being president of the Hooterville Phone Company has been a rude awakening for Oliver. The switchboard operator is now calling him at five in the morning! After a bevy of new complaints from unhappy customers, Oliver has just about had enough.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: One might think that when Eb takes a vacation, things around the farm might go more smoothly. But when Eb elopes, leaving his cousin Walter to take his place, it turns out to be a horrible idea. Walter barely knows a weed from a hole in the ground!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa is reminded that she stored a birthday present for Oliver years ago: a genuine Stavinsky. But what is it? It's a modern art sculpture that is two parts plumbing pipes, one part tire chains, and one part birdbath. Oliver calls it The Thing.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The continually evolving story of how Lisa (Eva Gabor) and Oliver (Oliver) fell in love gets yet another version in this delightful episode. But one thing is for sure: Lisa and Oliver are just as in love today as the day when he fell out of the sky.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Green Acres is greener than ever…with jealousy. When Oliver (Eddie Albert) hires a handsome, young, intelligent Brit to take over his farm work while he is away, it doesn't take long for the newcomer to make a strong impression on Lisa (Eva Gabor).

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Mr. Haney is up to his money-making schemes again. When a government representative tells Mr. Haney that the state is looking to purchase the Douglas farm for a new highway, Mr. Haney arranges to buy back the farm from the Douglases at a steal.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Ralph, the lady carpenter, runs away from home and stays with the Douglases after having a fight with her brother, Alf. While Oliver may never get his bedroom finished, he gains a maid as Ralph takes over as the Douglases' live-in housekeeper.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Picking apples while on a picnic, Oliver runs into the feisty Ira Hatch, the owner of the apple orchard. However, once back in town, Mr. Drucker tells Oliver that Hatch has been dead for years. An incredulous Oliver agrees to see a psychologist.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After his elopement and cross-country honeymoon, Eb returns to Hooterville. But his new wife is nowhere to be found! After sending postcards from all across the country, Eb has to confess that his fiancé stood him up at the alter on their big day.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Someone has stolen $300 from Mr. Drucker's general store, and it looks like Eb is the culprit. How else could he have bought himself a new car that cost, you guessed it, exactly $300? But that is just the first twist of the many turns of this story.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa's dreams come true, and so do Oliver's nightmares, when Eb discovers a runaway boy sleeping in the hay in their barn. Lisa is only too excited about the idea of having the sounds of platters of little feet around the house.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Arnold, the Ziffels' television-loving pig, has taken on a paper route to save enough money for a new color set. But when bank robbers show up and threaten his dreams, and Lisa and Oliver are held captive in their own home, Arnold has to fight back.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The farmers of Hooterville are headed to France! Or at least they are if they can get organized. As part of an agricultural exchange program, the farmers are offered a chance to join a chartered government flight to Europe.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Love is in the air as the first day of spring arrives in Hooterville. And who better to lead the town in celebrating it than Lisa. She is resolved to show Oliver just what spring is all about and sets out to produce a Spring festival celebration.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: It's a hair-raising episode as Eb (Tom Lester) enrolls in a correspondence course to become a barber. Lisa (Eva Gabor) and Oliver (Eddie Albert) give him the money to learn the trade but learning how to cut hair by mail has its glitches.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: For a lawyer, Oliver should be more careful about what he signs. Lisa reminds him that two years ago Oliver made her a promise to take her back to New York for a two-week vacation. And she has it in writing… on the bottom of the kitchen drawer.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: It's hard to know who has a curse over Oliver, but he sure has his hands full with Lisa and her fellow Hungarian Lazlo Broslav. Lazlo appears with a letter claiming he once saved the life of Lisa's uncle, and now her family must repay the debt.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: There's a problem in Hooterville: no farmer seems able to grow a cash crop on account of the quality of the soil. But as it turns out from Oliver's (Eddie Albert) soil and mineral research, the oft-misunderstood rutabaga is an ideal choice.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: An insurance company hires Barnaby to investigate the theft of $500,000 worth of platinum from a jewelry company. During the robbery an employee is shot and killed by the robber, but Barnaby suspects it may be an inside job.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman hires Barnaby to look into the death of her father who was apparently killed by a computer programmed machine in his own plant. It isn't too long before Barnaby suspects foul play rather computer malfunction.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: The parents of an up-and-coming songwriter ask Barnaby for help in uncovering the truth after he dies of a heroin overdose.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Betty urges Barnaby to look into the death of an old girlfriend, and they soon discover that another old girlfriend of Betty's is directly involved in her death.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Honolulu prostitutes are being murdered, and those who have not been are living in terror. McGarrett feels sure the murderer's game is extortion — a demand accompanied by a death threat which is carried out if the demand is not met.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Five bodies found in Mauna Loa volcano crater due to radioactive poisoning from plutonium exposure. Steve McGarrett investigates to find source on the Island.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Steve McGarrett searches for unknown international assassin whose next target may be a VIP. Murder of CIA agent and hotel PR director lead to investigation.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Forger Hunter Hickey steals $14,000 from Five-O, prepares for $100k forgery on bank & Navy. Steve McGarrett tries to stop him.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes the annual Trans-Pac race from California to Hawaii, bringing Steve McGarrett and his Five-O agents onto the sporty yachting scene in search of a trio of mutineer-murderers.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Wrongly convicted man escapes prison to prove innocence after refusing parole. McGarrett's only clue: claim accepting parole would mean guilt admission.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Tibbs is convinced that the right man is in custody for the recent murder in the Bottoms of a cab driver. The initial evidence points to his suspect, but Gillespie has his doubts and asks Tibbs to consider that race may be a factor in his choice.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Sparta Councilperson Harriet DeLong’s sister, Natalie, is found murdered, and Chief Gillespie has a suspect in mind, but it happens to be the most powerful man in town, so he’s keeping it quiet as he builds a case, much to the frustration of Tibbs.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Harriet DeLong is determined to bring her sister Natalie's killer to justice and decides to try handling things on her own. Meanwhile, the murder of Jay Turkus causes Gillespie and Tibbs to concentrate on V.J. Trundel and his devious staff.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: When an old friend and colleague apparently commits suicide, Virgil Tibbs travels to Philadelphia and uncovers corruption within the police force. Back in Sparta, Althea is close to giving birth, and Bubba is recruited to help with her Lamaze class.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A wanted poster plays a key role in the life of Richard Kimble when it discloses his identity to the sister of a young hoodlum.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver and Jack Dalton come to the rescue of an Indian who is kidnapped by fortune hunters seeking the secret location of a legendary mask.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: An abandoned baby lands MacGyver and Jack Dalton in the middle of a sophisticated counterfeiting scheme.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: After visiting an old flame who's now working as a Park Ranger, MacGyver finds himself in the middle of a grizzly poaching investigation.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver protects a 14-year-old from the mob after his grandfather is killed for refusing to sell out his international shipping company.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Jesse and Susan are on their way to Mount Carmel for a romantic getaway weekend but detour to a fishing town when their car breaks down. They grab a bite at the local diner when Susan sees a man she used to know.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: When resident Paul Brewer is killed, it's the second murder in a month at the exclusive gated community, Hillview Estates. With no leads on the killer, Steve goes undercover as Dr. Steve Brewer, a community resident.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Personal grievances get in the way of detective Harry Trumble's retirement party. Trumble never forgave Dr. Sloan for marrying his college sweetheart and dedicated his life to his work.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Dr. Sloan treats Amanda and Jesse to lunch to acknowledge Amanda's medical examiner investigation award. Unfortunately, their festivities are interrupted when a young man collapses in the hotel restaurant wearing only a bathrobe.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose at Community General, targeting both patients and doctors. Dr. Sloan, Steve, Amanda, and Jesse notice that a murder takes place every hour on the hour.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Kwai Chang Caine (DAVID CARRADINE) assists blind preacher Serenity Johnson (JOHN CARRADINE) to swindle the most dangerous man in Arizona.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Kwai Chang Caine (DAVID CARRADINE) comes to the aid of a Black family and a white family whose sons are kidnapped by a renegade Confederate Army officer.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: David Carradine stars as a Buddhist monk and hunted man who wanders the American West in the 1870s fighting intolerance and injustice with his mastery of an ancient form of high combat known as Kung Fu.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Vint and Naomi are having trouble in the bedroom, Mama and Iola soon discover exactly what it is when they turn on Good Morning Raytown, and special guest Dr. Joyce Brothers agrees to take a few phone calls live on-air.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Iola is distraught when her cat Midnight dies, although everyone else is thankful. But Iola refuses to let go and nothing can console her---until she decides to have it freeze-dried.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Naomi gives Bubba and Vint a love test to see how romantic they are, it turns out Vint is a "cold fish" and Bubba is a "Red Hot Romeo." Vint decides to be more romantic and talks Bubba into writing her a love letter.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: In this Thanksgiving episode, Mama, Bubba, Vinton, Naomi, Iola, and Aunt Effie (Dorothy Van) all go for cover in the basement when an unexpected tornado passes by Raytown.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Iola's beloved pearls have mysteriously disappeared, she is quick to accuse Bubba, who comes in with a brand new drum set.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama wants to be named President of the Church Ladies League, so she invites the Reverend and Alberta Meechum to dinner. It's just then that Bubba sees in the newspaper that one of his former inmates at Juvenile Hall has escaped

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Unhappy with the rut she's gotten into, Naomi decides to make a change and arrives home with the news that, after seeing an ad in the paper, she's decided to attend school to train as a flight attendant.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Vinton is chosen to play Santa at the Raytown Mall. However, with too much practice, he loses his voice! So Mama fills in the last second as Santa Claus.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama and Naomi's plan to find a date for Iola backfires when the date is more interested in Mama.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama is appalled when she finds a girlie magazine under Bubba's bed while cleaning. When it's revealed that Naomi sold it to him, Iola, Mama, Aunt Effie, and Pearl form MOP (Mothers Opposing Pornography), and set out to boycott.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Attempting to raise money for a trip to Hawaii, Mama talks her way into working at the same burger joint where Bubba has recently been hired.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: An anonymous letter convinces Vinton that he's adopted, so he sets out to find his biological mother... on Mother's Day.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama is surprised to learn she was entered in the Grandma USA contest by Bubba. She is reluctant to compete but changes her mind when she finds out the grand prize is a dream kitchen, complete with a self-cleaning oven.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Vint's former Army sergeant comes to town on a recruiting trip and he and Vint go out for a night of beers. Taking some advice from the Sargent he enlists in the military after being dumped by his girlfriend, to Mama's dismay.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama's worldly cousin (Vicki Lawrence in a dual role) annoys Mama with her lifestyle and her never-ending stories. (Note: Dorothy Lyman does not appear in this episode.)

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama emerges as a contender in an arm-wrestling competition and goes up against a biker's equally tough mother.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Naomi's best friend Luann has just been divorced and Naomi wants to set her up with a friend of hers for a double date with her and Vint. When Luann's date cancels, Naomi suggests Bubba stand in, much to Mama's chagrin.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Vint announces he's been invited to join The Mystical Order of the Cobra, a local Men's club. Mama, not wanting Vint to make it in, sabotages him, leaving it up to her to save him from humiliation during the ceremony.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Vint announces that Naomi is the sole beneficiary of his $20,000 life insuracne policy, much to Mama's dismay. Following the announcment, Vint starts having a number of suspicious accidents.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Aunt Effie is in the hospital, after she falls re-shingling the roof of her house. Mama thinks she's is just in shock, and needs to be around the family.

programme.desc: Fiona and Imogen scheme to end Marisol’s Student Council reign. The plan? Throw an unforgettable end-of-semester Degrassi holiday carnival. But with a huge family crisis looming, Fiona worries she may have over-promised.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Katie's anger at Drew boils over, she searches for a way to make him suffer. Eli clashes with Becky while planning Degrassi's next play. Meanwhile, a new guy catches Tristan's eye.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew feels like his life is falling apart. Is he upset about losing Bianca, or is something bigger going on? While casting the play, Eli and Becky work to resolve their creative differences.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig tries to hide the fact that he's poor from Tori. When Eli shares his vision for the musical, Dave isn’t sure he has what it takes to play Romeo. Fiona returns to Degrassi, thrilled to see her girlfriend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig will do anything to impress Tori… even steal. Fiona wants Imogen to define their relationship: Are they a couple or not? The hockey team teases Dave about his role in the play.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Alli is offered a scholarship to MIT, her parents are bursting with pride -- but is it the right choice? Meanwhile, Jake decides college isn't for him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jenna bonds with Becky -- and Becky's hot brother, Luke -- but will religious differences come between them? Clare obsesses over her journalism mentor, Asher. Drew is offered a job.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jenna gets baptized, but did she do it for the wrong reasons? Drew is failing his classes, and considers dropping out of Degrassi. Connor's tweets embarrass Clare in front of Asher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare tries to impress Asher by pitching a story about Romeo and Jules. K.C. and Bianca play matchmaker for K.C.'s mom. Katie chaperones Maya's date with Cam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A secret is eating away at Clare, but will facing the truth make things worse for her? K.C.'s mom has some surprising news. Meanwhile, Maya tries to impress Cam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cam needs a break from hockey, so he blows off practice to hang out with Maya. K.C.'s dad is release from jail, but is he ready to have him back in the picture? Fiona's loft is a disaster, and she blames her new roommate -- Drew.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cam struggles to live up to everyone's expectations on the ice. K.C. wants his dad out of his life -- even if it means doing something drastic. Drew and Fiona try to work out their differences.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imogen designs an elaborate set for Romeo and Jules, and reaches out to her estranged mother for the money to build it. Meanwhile, Becky interferes with ticket sales.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imogen worries about her dad's strange behavior. Becky bonds with Adam without realizing that he's transgender. Katie and Jake realize they have feelings for each other -- but where does that leave Mike Dallas?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare writes an article that stirs up trouble at school and makes her a new enemy -- Mike Dallas. Tori, Tristan, and Dave compete in a talent contest. Drew feels distant from Bianca, so he goes on a spending spree.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eli organizes a surprise birthday party to cheer Clare up, and starts to suspect that she's hiding something. Audra urges Drew to go back to Degrassi. Dave worries that he and Alli are growing apart.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When a group of parents try to stop the play, Eli takes action. As opening night approaches, Tristan realizes that if he doesn't find a boyfriend fast, his first kiss will be onstage -- with Dave. Meanwhile, Becky wants to "save" Adam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On opening night for Romeo and Jules, Tristan is nowhere to be found. Is it stage fright -- or something worse? While Eli is busy with the play, Clare decides to get even with Asher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Becky doesn't want to keep Adam a secret, so she decides to tell her parents that he's transgender.
