programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores a Bronze Age archaeological site near Stonehenge to piece together the story of a prehistoric hunter who used a bow and arrow.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards delves into the story behind the ancient bones discovered in a field in Gloucestershire. They are a grim reminder of a battle fought thousands of years ago.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards visits Hereford Cathedral to unveil the story behind a medieval burial site. The findings depict a rough picture of the lives led by priests in the past.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards tries to piece together the story of an Iron Age girl whose remains were found at an archaeological site in Bourton-on-the-Water, Cotswold.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards examines two unusual Roman burials in Bath, investigating why the deceased were interred against custom, including one in a lead coffin. He traces this period from Christianity's rise to the end of Roman Britain.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards visits the sand dunes near Bamburgh Castle to investigate a burial ground. The findings are likely to help piece together the life story of King Oswald of Bernicia.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores the gravesite of Lawrence Spencer, a labourer who played a significant role in construction of St Paul's Cathedral under Christopher Wren during the 1600s.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores excavation sites where remains of human beings are discovered. He uses facial reconstruction technology to illuminate numerous stories lost in the mists of time.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Richards examines a site with 47 infant remains killed by malaria. This suggests an epidemic may have contributed to Rome's fall. To investigate further, experts study deliberately sunken Roman ships in Sardinia, seeking conclusive evidence.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards delves into the origins of the Hampton Court Palace with a team of archaeologists. The curator believes that the construction may have been influenced by Italian Renaissance architecture.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores an ancient trackway that holds considerable significance in Celtic history. The site tells various unheard stories of the British Iron Age.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Starting in Uruk, the `mother of all cities', in southern Iraq, Richard travels to Syria, Egypt, Anatolia and Greece, tracing the birth and development of technology and culture.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard looks at the winners and losers of the great Bronze Age collapse, and the new powers that emerged in the harder-edged Age of Iron.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard Miles explores the power and the paradox of the `Greek Thing', a blossoming in art, philosophy and science that went hand-in-hand with political discord, social injustice and endless war.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: In Richard Miles's epic story of civilisation, there have been plenty of examples of the great men of history, but none came close to the legend of Alexander of Macedon, known as `the Great'.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Genesis of the Daleks
programme.desc: When the Kaled dome is destroyed by the Thals' rocket, the war appears to be over and the Thals rejoice at their victory. But then, the Daleks appear and a massacre begins.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Genesis of the Daleks
programme.desc: With Harry and Sarah as his prisoners, Davros interrogates the Doctor, forcing him to reveal the future of the Daleks so that he can learn from their defeats to make them stronger.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Genesis of the Daleks
programme.desc: The Kaled scientific elite move to prevent the development of the Daleks while the Doctor prepares to destroy them forever. But is it already too late?

programme.title: Doctor Who: Revenge of The Cybermen

programme.title: Doctor Who: Revenge of The Cybermen

programme.title: Doctor Who: Revenge of The Cybermen

programme.desc: The Cybermen intend to crash the bomb-laden Nerva Beacon into the planet Voga.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Pyramids of Mars

programme.title: Doctor Who: Pyramids of Mars

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Android Invasion

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Android Invasion
programme.desc: The Doctor discovers Styggron's plan to wipe out all human life on Earth.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Android Invasion

programme.desc: The Doctor and Sarah take shelter in the castle of Dr. Solon on the planet Karn.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: Keeler has been infected by the alien pod and is transforming into a Krynoid. Chase refuses to listen to the Doctor’s warning and throws him into a compost machine.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.desc: Cesar's toughest cases have included a bulldog that munched on skateboards, a dog that gnawed garden hoses and basketballs, and a pit bull with issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt, Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: World's Wildest City: Anchorage

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: A cargo net is draped off the back of a stage coach. Contestants take turns playing street hockey goalie as a hockey puck machine shoots pucks at them. Three wet pipes are suspended by cranes 90 feet up in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant must exit from a speed boat by grabbing onto ladder that is hanging out of a helicopter. The contestant has to transfer mealworms from a Plexiglas container to a scale. Contestants will launch themselves in a car off a 3 foot high ramp.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will climb up 4 stories on a hook and ladder with 70 pounds of gear. Contestant must lay in a pit for 2 minutes while scorpions are dropped on them. Contestants will be put on a platform suspended from a crane 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants fall out of a speeding helicopter. Contestant must consume 10 live slugs and a shot of cow bile. Each contestant must cross between two buildings by placing three planks in front of them on top of two tight ropes as they walk.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities track a kidnapper who let his victim write a last will and informed the family of her murder. A phone number written on a previous page left a lasting impression, which helped to convict.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis participantes restantes deben replicar los platos que les preparó el Chef Ramsay. Los ganadores cenarán con la ganadora de la cuarta temporada, Christina Machamer.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El desafío para cada uno de los concursantes restantes es hacer un plato que se vea y sepa igual. Los expertos de la revista 'Bon Appetit' ayudan al Chef Ramsay a juzgar.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los participantes conocen una versión en miniatura del Chef Ramsay: el actor y chico impresionista británico Felix Light. Deben preparar comidas sin carne para él y otros ochenta jóvenes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la primera parte del final de temporada, los tres concursantes restantes deberán preparar un plato con ingredientes de todo el mundo. Los jueces son un grupo de expertos culinarios internacionales.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la parte final del final de temporada, los Chefs finales deben preparar platos dignos de Araxi, el restaurante y bar de ostras donde el ganador será el Chef.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día uno
programme.desc: Doce chefs compiten para impresionar a Gordon Ramsay. Ellos trabajan para abrir un renombrado restaurante en Los Ángeles. Ahí se descubre la próxima estrella culinaria.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día dos
programme.desc: Después de apenas sobrevivir la noche de apertura del restaurante Hell's Kitchen, los concursantes se preparan para su segundo servicio de cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día tres
programme.desc: Los chefs se preparan para su tercer servicio de cena, pero la presión de Hell's Kitchen es demasiado para un concursante.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cuatro
programme.desc: Los concursantes intentan recrear los platos característicos de Gordon para un público exigente de Los Ángeles.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cinco
programme.desc: Las tensiones surgen en la cocina durante la noche italiana. En el restaurante hay un equipo que quiere ganar jugando sucio.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día seis
programme.desc: En la primera mitad de este especial de dos horas, el chef Ramsay revela el último giro: cada equipo creará su propio menú que consta de tres aperitivos, platos principales y postres.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día siete
programme.desc: En la parte final de este especial de dos horas, los cinco concursantes restantes descubren que ya no compiten como equipos, sino como individuos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día ocho
programme.desc: Los cuatro chefs restantes reciben quince minutos y una bandeja con sobras para crear una comida que el chef Ramsay considera servible.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy feigns a crisis to test Ricky's love after hearing a story about a woman whose husband ignored her pleas for help while being robbed—she assumes Ricky would turn his back on her too.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ben Benjamin arrives at the Ricardos' apartment, Lucy mistakes Ben Benjamin, a Hollywood talent scout, for a burglar and nearly ruins Ricky's chance for a film career.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: For their trip out west, Ricky buys a new car to replace the old, beat-up one Fred bought. Lucy convinces her husband to teach her how to drive it. After one driving lesson, Ricky is a harried and beaten man.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's mother wants to join the Ricardos on their road trip out west. As anticipated, Ricky blows his stack when he hears that Lucy's mother wants to go along, and continues to complain that everyone's going on the trip.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En 1987, un productor de televisión exitoso fue baleado en su oficina de Nueva York. Parecía ser un crimen profesional. Sin pistas, la investigación llegó a un punto muerto.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: El robo a un camión blindado en Nueva York en 1981 dejó a un guardia muerto y a otro herido de gravedad. La policía detuvo a unos sospechosos en las cercanías y se produjo otra balacera que costó las vidas de dos oficiales.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: Cuando un hombre de California fue encontrado descuartizado en 1990, la policía puso sus sospechas en un ladrón local, pero no pudieron encontrarlo. Seis meses más tarde, fue atrapado robando un banco de Arizona y condenado de por vida.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: Al principio, cuando David Wilkey fue asesinado de un disparo en la zona rural de Virginia en 1983, pareció un accidente trágico de cacería. Un tenaz investigador de seguros sospechó de una maniobra sucia, pero no tenía pruebas concluyentes.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: Un cuerpo en llamas en un callejón oscuro arroja luz sobre un asesino. Sus compañeros en el crimen contarían la historia, si hubieran sobrevivido.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En 1994, una inmigrante adolescente fue a los Estados Unidos para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en doctora. Pero un giro trágico del destino intervino cuando se convirtió en una víctima inocente del comercio de las drogas.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: A mitad de los años 90, una banda de ladrones profesionales de bancos realizó ataques en ciudades a lo largo de siete estados.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En el verano de 1998, una mujer acaudalada de Jackson, Misisipi, desapareció de su casa a plena luz del día. Solo quedó una misteriosa nota al azar con doce nombres y sin instrucciones específicas.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Part 5 of 5. As the weather dominator device is reassembled at Cobra's Temple, it's up to the Jor team's full-scale assault on the base to prevent the world from falling into Cobra's grasp!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Baseball Seasons

programme.title: Play Ball

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a laser of a three-run homer in the 7th inning, then followed that up with a grand slam on a 3-0 pitch in the 8th. The slam was the first of the young phenom's career and caused a bit of controversy in the process.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Los Shores reunidos revivirán los mejores momentos de los primeros 10 episodios de sus segundas vacaciones en un especial confidencial. Pero cuidado que esto aún no termina, todavía faltan los últimos tres episodios de Súper Shore 2.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: La primera noche de Karime y Labrador en la casa se celebra con una grandiosa fiesta en la que Cañete es víctima de Karime. Para salir de la dinámica de fiestas y chiringuitos de playa, los chicos planean irse de acampada.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: El cumpleaños de Arantxa se convierte en el acontecimiento del verano. Las sorpresas y las celebraciones se prolongan durante varios días de divertidísimas fiestas.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Todo lo que empieza tiene que terminar y así pasa con estas vacaciones en las costas del mediterráneo. Llega la hora en que los chicos de Súper Shore deberán de despedirse.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Los Shores reunidos repasan los mejores momentos de sus segundas vacaciones en un especial confidencial. Ellos verán las mejores fiestas, las peleas, los momentos más importantes de sus vacaciones y lo que eso conlleva

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Nuevas vacaciones comienzan para la familia más disfuncional. Serán en Rimini, Italia la tierra de la matadora de Italia, Elettra.El primer episodio sorprende a los Shores con muchos cambios dentro de la familia y con una casa espectacular.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Todo parece indicar que el desmadre este año lo empiezan a poner los nuevos discípulos. Victor trata de seducir a Elettra, Isaac juega con Adela para ver quien tiene el control y Ferre tontea todo el tiempo seduciendo a Eva hasta que se pelean.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Llega el boss, es italiano y tiene carácter, comienza regañándolos y los envía a trabajar crudos. Isaac está de cumpleaños y recibe muchos regalos, incluido el de Adela. Elettra come una pizza que la pone cachonda. Una gran alegría llega a Rimini.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Hay tensión en la casa, Adela está de malas con Elettra que no entiende cual es el problema, pero el problema es que ella se está ligando a Isaac adelante e Adela y a este parece no importarle.Victor y Potro se dicen sus verdades.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Karime y Elettra arman un plan para ligarse a Ferre y a Isaac delante de Adela y Eva porque no les gusta su actitud irrespetuosa, estas dos están un poco sorprendidas por lo que pasa y no saben bien como enfrentarlo.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Las vacaciones van a tope para todos menos para Eva que parece no disfrutar lo que está viviendo, ni la llegada de su amigo Pietro logra sacarle el mood negativo a la francesa de fuego. Al mismo tiempo la casa está en shock por un chisme.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Los shore llegan a Roma. Hay discusiones por ver quién se queda con quién en el hotel. Potro está molesto porque Karime y Elettra se quedan con Víctor y se roban el cuarto del amor. Toda la belleza romana invadida porn los shores que cantan.

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: Mucha tensión en las mini vacaciones en Roma, Potro parece alejarse definitivamente de Karime y gasta una broma al grupo muy pesada. Danik y Elettra finalmente chocan en una pelea dura que divide a la casa.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers helps to weave a scarf. Henrietta Pussycat's ballet teacher, Miss Cloud, does not speak but communicates with movement. The Junior Tamburitzans perform two folk dances. Mister Rogers talks about making up stories and dances.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood

programme.desc: Mister Rogers arrives with a clown mask. "Mayor" Sara prepares a speech as two lost clowns arrive. To help the clowns find their way to the Neighborhood of Make-Believe, Queen Sara suggests that she and Mayor Maggie trade jobs.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Nancy Caterpillar sees herself in a mirror and realizes that she is very special the way she is. She turns into a butterfly. Mister Rogers visits the circus and sees Jeff Gabel apply his clown make-up.

programme.desc: Mister Rogers shows pictures of the night and day skies. He plays with a star on a string and then remembers his trip to Moscow, where he met Russian children's television program producers. There is a pretend star falling from a string.

programme.title: El precio de la historia

programme.title: El agua es nuestro futuro

programme.title: El agua es nuestro futuro
programme.desc: Esta región en el centro de Alemania ha sido marcada por el carbón y el acero. Pero el progreso insutrial le costó la vida a otro río: el Émsher. Encerrado en un canal de concreto, el Émsher se convirtió en el desagüe tóxico del distrito Róar.

programme.title: El agua es nuestro futuro

programme.title: Ataque Animal

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Shirley is here to get her boyfriend, Jackie's, ex out of their lives once and for all! Next, Mike is fed up with both his mother and his wife. He wants his mom to butt out of his life while he dumps his wife for good!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: The show continues with more past guests returning to add to the mayhem!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Jake is here because he says that he knew he was in love with his girlfriend Lindsey the first time she ever asked him for a side of cheese. Then Shaina says she's in love with not one but two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Beep runs a convenience store and he's fallen in love with the girlfriend of one of the patrons. Next James has been waiting for 5 years to take his revenge on his brother. Then Michelle has a shocking experience with a shocking person!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Our guests today say they have no shame when it comes to affairs of the heart. They say their deceptive ways are catching up with them and that they need to tell the truth!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Kenny lived with sisters Lora and Misty, who are also his lovers but he treats them like servants. Later, Jerry confronts Kenny with the results of the 9 positive paternity tests, but Kenny says he only cares about 2 of his 9 children.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Amy is here to confront her husband, Fury's, ex-mistress, Shauna, for continuing to butt into their lives. Shauna says she loves Fury but admits that she's been sleeping with her cousin, Becky! Then Becky reveals to all that she slept with Fury!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Christina is a dial-a-date telephone operator. She is here to confront the woman who is trying to steal her man! Next Tika says her boyfriend is trying to move his other lover, Cherly, into their home!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Jon is here to tell his girlfriend that he's been cheating on her with her brother! Next Kelly will dump her boyfriend for her secret lover, Bart. Then Malikah will tell her fiancé that she's had a secret lover for the past 3 years!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Bambi gives us a rare, honest look into her ultra-exclusive lifestyle in LA. Tiffany confronts C.T. over a rotten business deal.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Denise has her two live-in lovers on a schedule! The father of her children gets Tuesdays and Saturdays and her other lover gets the rest of the week! Next After Tom's wife kicked him out, he's been hearing rumors that she's sleeping with his nephew!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Sarah and Gaylon are 17 with a 7-month-old daughter. Gaylon has paternity doubts because Sarah admitted to sleeping with two other men before she became pregnant! His mother wants him to take a DNA test to move on with his life!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Korey is positive that his girlfriend Dominique is cheating on him and is also worried that she might be selling sex. She says that his suspicions have caused him to become abusive. Then, Gregory thinks that his girlfriend Robin isn’t faithful!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Sheroya is 17 and struggling to raise 2 kids while trying to party all the time. Her boyfriend Malcolm frequently cheats and verbally abuses her. Steve’s got a lot of work ahead with this couple, but will either of them wake up?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los invitados del episodio de hoy de MAURY tienen secretos que revelar, pero ¿se arrepentirán de contarlos? Hay relaciones en peligro. Puede que haya corazones rotos. ¿Podrán estas parejas sobrevivir a los secretos que amenazan con separarlos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, en MAURY, terminó la espera. Finalmente mostramos los resultados emocionantes de las pruebas de paternidad de ayer. Además, las nuevas parejas están cruzando los dedos para recibir las respuestas que quieren.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, Marisol regresa por 12º vez para hacer la prueba de su 15º hombre. Luego, Dalyna vino a demostrar que Johnny Mack es el padre de su hijo. Él dice que es imposible porque le parece que el bebé es "demasiado feo" para ser suyo.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Rhonda está segura de que John es el padre de su hijo. ¡Incluso la mamá de John está de acuerdo con ella! Después, Kim y Heather solían ser amigas, pero eso fue antes de que Rick la dejara por Heather. Sin embargo, Kim está segura de que Rick es el padre.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy en MAURY, te pondremos al día con algunos de nuestros invitados más emocionantes. Los resultados de paternidad asombraron a todo el mundo. ¿Qué pasó después de revelar las respuestas y que estos invitados retomaron sus vidas?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los huéspedes de MAURY han estado ocultando secretos horribles de sus seres queridos y eso les está desgarrando por dentro. ¡Están listos para confesar, incluso si eso les hace perder sus relaciones! ¿Se quedarán o se irán sus seres queridos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Centavia sospecha que su novio Richard la engaña con Kheisha, la niñera. Después, Kristy le revelará 2 secretos a su novio Matt que podrían terminar su relación. ¡Descubre estos secretos impactantes hoy!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: En el episodio de hoy de MAURY, estos hombres dicen que saben que la prueba de paternidad demostrará lo que siempre han sabido: que no son padres de los hijos de las mujeres que los trajeron aquí. ¡Ellas van a demostrar que están equivocados!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¡Estas mujeres han venido con preguntas urgentes! Kendra quiere que su esposo Richard admita que es el padre de su hijo Y del hijo de su amante! ¡Jevon y su familia no creen que él sea el padre del hijo de Jazmine! ¡Solo MAURY tiene las respuestas!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Grace, la madre de Eddie, no los va a dejar vivir con ella a menos que Kay Kay pueda demostrar que su hijo, Eddie, es el padre de su nieto. Después, Troy niega ser el padre de los cinco hijos de Vanessa.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: La furiosa mamá Patty quiere demostrar que el novio de su hija, Dale, un hombre que duplica la edad de su hija, ha sido infiel. ¿Entonces Bam fue infiel a Brianna en su propia cama?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Keisha sabe que Desmond es el padre de su bebé, ¡pero él la quiere fuera de su vida! Después, dos madres desesperadas se enfrentan al padre de sus tres hijos.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Kiki y su hermana Sad-e aseguran que el novio de Kiki, Tavon, es un infiel. ¿Qué dirán cuando aparezca en nuestra cámara oculta? Entonces, ¿los hijos de James y Nikkie son realmente suyos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿La esposa del pastor Terry lo engañó con 200 hombres diferentes? A continuación, Naomi quiere averiguar si su prometido, Jesse, es un infiel. ¿Qué revelarán los resultados en Maury hoy?

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Karina, desesperada, se toma una cantidad de pastillas para quitarse la vida. Silvano visita a Teobaldo. Él le va a contar lo de la niña pero se aparece Sonia y se calla por miedo.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Eduarda y Maribella entran a la habitación de Rosaura para ponerle una sorpresa. María Julia le pide perdón a Iván por haber sido una mala madre.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Iván le da ánimos a Karina y le dice que lea la carta de Maximiliano. Luis Mario le cuenta a Gabriel lo que le pasó con Silvano y Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Luis Mario se cae del caballo y Silvano se acerca a él. Panchita le cuenta a Samuel todo lo que pasó, incluído lo que hizo Bruno dándole un caballo enfermo a Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Iván y Rodrigo van a la casa de Eva y le sueltan en la cara que esa casa es de Karina, según el testamento de su papá. Silvano va a ver a Rosaura pero Doña Cruz le dice que se vaya.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura bota a todo el mundo de su oficina. Eduardo y Maribella se van pero Patricio se queda y le dice que quiere hablar con ella de la niña. Karina le dice a Eva que se va a morir.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio tiene en sus manos a Rosaura, con la excusa de entregarle a su hija. Luis Mario le promete a Maribella que le va a devolver todo el dinero que pagó por la hacienda.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Maribella y Sinaí preparan todo para que cuando Rosaura traiga el café se le caiga encima a Maribella, para echarle la culpa. La doctora le informa a Karina que deben hacerle los exámenes nuevamente.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldo piensa cumplir lo que le prometió a Mairita pero su mamá lo descubre. Maribella quiere que Luis Mario se acueste con ella. Pero el no lo acepta.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldo le confiesa a Rosaura que Angeliquita no es hija de su mamá. Gabriel le propone a Minerva que lo ayude a criar a su hijo. Teobaldo le vuelve a decir a Rosaura que no es verdad.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Eduarda llama a Rosaura, diciéndole que su hija está muerta. Karina le dice a Rosaura que no les haga caso. Eduarda y Maribella se ríen por la broma que le gastaron a Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: La doctora le informa a Karina que está gravemente enferma debido a su sangre. Mercedes llega cuando Silvano está besando a Rosaura y se mete reclamándole a Silvano que deje tranquila a Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Karina, desesperada, se toma una cantidad de pastillas para quitarse la vida. Silvano visita a Teobaldo. Él le va a contar lo de la niña pero se aparece Sonia y se calla por miedo.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Eduarda y Maribella entran a la habitación de Rosaura para ponerle una sorpresa. María Julia le pide perdón a Iván por haber sido una mala madre.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After Luffy's shadow power disappears, he'll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats – battered as they may be – refuse to go down without a fight!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends – and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Ash discovers a message in a bottle, which prompts our heroes to embark on a new journey on Sunburst Island and a quest for a highly elusive Onix!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Our heroes find themselves on Pinkan Island, home to numerous strangely colored Pokémon. Ash and Tracey are fascinated by these pink Pokémon…and so are the Team Rocket trio!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: After joining a scientific expedition to investigate a Kabuto fossil, Ash and their friends soon find themselves facing a series of natural disasters!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Another Water-type specialist challenges Misty to a battle and offers some advice: she thinks Misty's Psyduck might be ready to evolve!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: In Ash's second challenge against the Orange Crew, he must climb a mountain, build a bobsled, and win a sled race! Do his Pokémon have what it takes to help him through these obstacles?

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Our heroes' explorations take them to the seven Grapefruit Islands, where they learn that the islands' famous fruit has been disappearing! Ash, Misty, and Tracey set out to catch whoever's responsible.

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: When divers recover an ancient Orange League Championship trophy, our heroes head straight for the art museum where it's on display to check it out! Unfortunately, Team Rocket has beaten them to the punch…

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Meowth Rules!
programme.desc: When Team Rocket crashes on an island, Meowth is the center of attention when the locals mistake him for the 'Great Meowth of Bounty,' a powerful creature spoken of in prophecy. What will happen when they learn the truth?

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Tracey Gets Bugged

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: A Way Off Day Off
programme.desc: When Ash and friends find a wonderful island brimming with many kinds of fruit trees, they decide to take a break and enjoy the bounty! Of course, Team Rocket has other ideas…

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Wherefore Art Thou, Pokémon?
programme.desc: Our heroes meet a couple of Trainers who don't seem to get along at all, even though their Nidoran are obviously smitten with each other. Misty is determined to solve this romantic challenge!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Misty Meets Her Match

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Bound For Trouble
programme.desc: Ash and friends go in search of super-sized Pokémon, but when they fall for a Team Rocket trick, and then Pikachu and Meowth get snatched up by a giant Pidgeot, everyone must work together to get them back!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Charizard Chills

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: The Pokémon Water War

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Pokémon Food Fight

programme.desc: Un joven tiene que madurar y despertar cuando los oficiales lo cachan en un crimen. En un retén, un trío tiene mucho que ocultar. Un policía pacifica una pelea familiar causada por un juego de mesa.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Un sospechoso huye desesperadamente cuando hay disparos. Un padre e hija están atemorizados por un hombre que empuña un desarmador. La policía ve a muchas mujeres bellas tomando malas decisiones.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: La madre de un conductor desafiante le da razón a la policía. Los oficiales descubren a un hombre con un disfraz raro durante una parada. La policía protege a una mamá trabajadora de la visita.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Un conductor evasivo le dice a la policía que es víctima de una chica muy mala. Una mujer embarazada toma decisiones cuestionables. Un sospechoso de robo se siente mejor al confesar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A un hombre enojado le cuesta aceptar la verdad. Los oficiales cuestionan a unas personas reservadas queriendo confirmar sus sospechas. Papá y mamá se ponen violentos y los niños llaman a la policía.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Los oficiales vienen al rescate cuando un hombre afligido toca fondo. Un hombre comienza una guerra de comida. Los agentes capturan a un hombre desprevenido mientras inspeccionan un estacionamiento.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Un hombre buscado se queja de dolor en el pecho después de golpear a un conductor. Una mujer se enoja por una bolsa de papas picante. Un hombre violento por fin aprende cual es el límite de su novia.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Supuestos ladrones de joyas intentan escapar durante una persecución a alta velocidad. El arresto de un hombre peleonero es un reto. Hay pelea matrimonial cuando una parada revela artículos ilegales.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Un fugitivo desesperadamente decide huir a pie. Una novia sobreprotectora duda de la policía y la esposan. Un celoso pierde a la novia y más después de buscar pleito con el hijo.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Un hombre de delito reincidente lleva a la policía por un camino rugoso. Un oficial aconseja a dos adolescentes en un auto estacionado. Unos oficiales le cuentan el secreto a una mujer de su hermano.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: La policía busca a un sospechoso en un barrio y lo encuentran en un aprieto. Se investiga a un auto estacionado detrás de una iglesia. Un oficial aconseja a una madre joven con un pasado problemático.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Una persecución a pie termina con el sospechoso en una situación vergonzosa. Un automovilista llama a la policía cuando un peatón pierde la calma. Un hombre arriesga su relación con malas manías.

programme.title: Gotham Comedy Live
programme.desc: Chelsea Lately’s acerbic genius Loni Love brings the house down in an all-new outrageous hour of uncensored stand-up. Variety and Comedy Central named Loni as one of the Top 10 Comedians to Watch.

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents
programme.desc: Loni Love adores her 99-cent store, her body and the 1980s, despite the era's jacked-up fashion.

programme.title: Gotham Comedy Live
programme.desc: It's another laugh-out-loud night of standup as comedian, actress and The View co-host Sherri Shepherd takes center stage. Join Sherri and four of America's funniest comics: Grayson Morris, Mike Finoia, Deven Bouchet and Jimmy Failla.

programme.title: John Oliver's New York Stand-Up Show: Deon Cole, Moshe Kasher, Marina Franklin, Maria Bamford
programme.desc: Deon Cole imagines opening up a black coffee shop, Moshe Kasher reveals the truth about Jim Morrison's grave, and Maria Bamford tries online dating.

programme.title: John Oliver's New York Stand-Up Show: Mike Lawrence, Marina Franklin, Brendon Walsh, Greg Behrendt
programme.desc: Mike Lawrence weighs in on Christian Bale's Batman, Marina Franklin admires Michelle Obama, Brendon Walsh describes his breakup style, and Greg Behrendt recalls his punk days.

programme.title: Sheryl Underwood: Too Much Information
programme.desc: Sheryl Underwood brings her brutal honesty and side-splitting observations about life to the stage in this hilarious stand-up comedy special.

programme.title: Mo'Nique: One Night Stand
programme.desc: Known for her sassy attitude and outrageous humor, Oscar winner Mo'Nique takes her side-splitting act to the stage in this hilarious stand-up comedy special.

programme.title: The Comedy Central Roast of Pamela Anderson
programme.desc: Roast Master Jimmy Kimmel leads a dais including Tommy Lee, Adam Carolla, Eddie Griffin, Sarah Silverman and Lisa Lampanelli as they sling burns at model and actress Pamela Anderson.

programme.title: Nikki Glaser: Perfect
programme.desc: Nikki Glaser contemplates what it means to become an adult woman, exploring issues like marriage, having a baby and learning how to be yourself in a relationship.

programme.title: Natasha Leggero: Live at Bimbo's
programme.desc: Natasha Leggero talks about her impending nuptials and dissects the most ridiculous parts of modern culture, from online shopping to Burning Man.

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents
programme.desc: Tig Notaro describes nonsensical SkyMall items, wonders what her cat is thinking and learns about cultural sensitivity from Barbies.

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents

programme.title: Gotham Comedy Live
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed "Love Goddess" Judy Tenuta hosts an all new hour of standup. Join in on the insanity with Judy and four of America's funniest comics Dan Crohn, Sal Calanni, Del Harrison and Anthony Devito for a night of non-stop, uncensored comedy.

programme.title: Gotham Comedy Live
programme.desc: Legendary comedian Paula Poundstone takes on the media in a brilliant hour of standup. Come see why Comedy Central named her one of the 100 Greatest Standups of All Time as she's joined by Daniel Crow, Joe Pontillo, Jermaine Warren and Greg Stone.

programme.title: Joan Rivers: Don't Start With Me

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Enterprise finds a deserted planet where a ship has crashed, and, with it, the lone survivor with no memory, but extraordinary healing powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation

programme.desc: Deep Space Nine prepares to face a Dominion/Cardassian attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The Voyager crew launches a daring rescue mission to save two officers trapped in a subterranean city facing disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Quinn is conflicted when a professor from his home planet asks SG-1 to help stage a coup against the Kelownan government in order to stop a civil war. Should SG-1 allow the planet to destroy itself…or are they placing themselves in needless danger?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Two scientists working on an off-world research project witness SG-1 captured in a Goa'uld raid and attempt to rescue them. Little do they know that SG-1 staged the capture in order to infiltrate the Goa'uld and make contact with a Tok'ra informant.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: SG-1 visits Pangar, a planet inhabited by humans who have developed a drug that makes their immune systems perfect. Unknown to SG-1 is the means by which the drug is produced, a startling discovery that may hold the key to the origins of the Tok'ra!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Rogue NSA officers hijack the X-303 spaceship and demand that Adrian Conrad be brought to the ship. Using his Goa'uld knowledge, Conrad activates the X-303 and takes the ship light-years from Earth as O'Neill and Teal'c stage a daring rescues.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: When SG-1 is marooned in deep space, Thor comes to the rescue. He then seek O'Neill's help to combat the Replicators. Convinced they will attack earth if not stopped, O'Neill stages a daring mission to stop the Replicators once and for all.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: SG-1 returns from a mission with an artifact that triggers the ability to see hideous yet harmless life forms in a parallel reality. As the effect spreads to civilians, O'Neill and his team must find a solution before mass hysteria breaks out.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Senator Kinsey suffers an assassination attempt while campaigning for the presidency, and O'Neill is caught on tape leaving the building where the shots were fired. With O'Neill behind bars, Carter, Teal'c and Jonas must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Into the Badlands

programme.title: Into the Badlands

programme.title: Into the Badlands

programme.title: Into the Badlands

programme.title: Into the Badlands
programme.desc: The Badlands' deadliest Clipper, Sunny, rescues a mysterious boy, M.K., who harbors a dark secret, but may also know the way out of the Badlands.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Animal Adaptations

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Check out this adventure to the Atacama Desert in Chile, where Jack searches for wildlife in the most unlikely of places, and gets a first-hand look at what it's like to live in this harsh yet beautiful environment.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he braves the waters of Botswana's Okavango Delta! The world's largest inland delta provides a beautiful home to thriving wildlife like Crocs, Hippos, and Elephants.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wildlife Crime-Fighters
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading to the frontlines witnessing conservation and anti-poaching efforts in action around the world all to help save threatened and endangered species. Rhinos, elephants, primates and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top Predators

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to the island-nation of Curacao for some quality time with its winged residents. From fearless flying Bats, and powerful Ostrich to pretty-in-pink Flamingos.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Does having a big brain mean you’re the smartest? Find out on today’s countdown as Jungle Jack meets the biggest brainiacs of the animal kingdom, like dolphins, elephants, dogs, sperm whales, chimpanzees and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he meets some animals that stockpile food and supplies. Check out the fascinating behaviors of Leaf-cutter Ants, Bears, Leopards, Honey Bees, Camels and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Countdown to Discovery
programme.desc: Join Jack as he meets up with six of the planet’s most recently discovered animals, like the elusive okapi, adorable pygmy hippo, rare sun-tailed monkey, highly endangered mountain gorilla, the see-through Fijian crested iguana, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as heads to the frontlines of wildlife conservation and meets the warriors working to save endangered species. Elephants, Rhinos, Bongo, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along for some epic Hanna family adventures like game ranger training in South Africa, babysitting a wombat in Tasmania, trekking with mandrills in Gabon, a horseback safari through Montana and a trip to meet some donkeys in Arizona!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he visits one of his favorite African destinations while enjoying beautiful unspoiled vistas, meeting amazing Masai people, and getting up close and personal with the animal population, including lions, elephants, hyenas, ostriches, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In criminal investigations, a simple clue can provide the missing link by placing a suspect at a crime scene. Dirt left on shoes, tires or clothes, or even a tiny piece of plastic can pinpoint a crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: New Forensic Techniques used to Solve Old Cases: Advancement in science and technology are encouraging people to revisit the past in hopes of answering questions that have remained unanswered, and solving crimes that seemed unsolvable.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drowning deaths often look like accidents and water can destroy the scant clues the killer may have left behind. Investigators must turn to forensic science to solve cases where the victim is found dead in the water.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Bombers, snipers, spree killers: some people don't care who they kill, they just want to hurt innocent people.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Toxicology: While drugs can cure disease and ease pain, they can also be agents of murder. Toxicologists can examine blood and tissue to uncover cases where death is not as natural as it may seem–from slow arsenic poisoning to quick cocaine overdoses.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. It's providing a challenge to forensic investigators devoted to cracking drug rings.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A good coroner provides what's necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can spoil an otherwise rock-solid case. Cyril Wecht and Henry Lee, two of the country's most respected coroners, share their cases and insights into crime solving.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims – And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder – These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: George Orwell's concept of Big Brother remains in the realm of fiction. But as technology becomes more a part of our lives, it's becoming increasingly more difficult to make a move without leaving behind an electronic trace.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: “To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth”.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In New York, an ambitious college student has her whole life ahead of her, until she crosses the path of a killer. It's a random murder, the hardest kind to solve.

programme.desc: When a rancher dies after the bank forecloses the mortgage on his property, his son blames the banker for his father's death.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I.'s friend K-Dub needs a place to stay, but after a few days, he overstays his welcome with the family. Meanwhile, King is inspired to set a world record and goes on a search to find one thing he can do that no one else can. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. is excited about his role in the new Superhero movie Ant-Man. Unfortunately, King and Major aren't. A proactive Tiny hatches a plan to nix any baby fever Niq Niq might have.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Major wants to take acting to the next level but struggles to focus. T.I. notices his older children don't help one another, so he takes them to a place where they are locked in a room & the only one way out is to work together. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: With Niq Niq living on her own, Tip and Tameka make a surprise visit to her apartment. But when Tip notices articles of clothing belonging to a man, he suspects she's having her boyfriend sleepover, which is against their rules. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tiny wants to find Precious a new man, this time by online dating. Meanwhile, Tip and Major play sick for some peace and quiet. However, when convincing his other sons to wait on him, he risks them finding out and wanting revenge. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tip gives the kids a crash course on Tip's new restaurant. Niq Niq is going solo and is excited to record her new single. But when Tameka becomes overbearing in the studio, the two women must figure out the right balance. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In this spooky mid-season finale, the family determines whether or not ghosts are real by investigating a house known to be haunted. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Domani attempts to showcase his talent as an all-around entertainer, this time as a talk show host and producer. With the help of Tiny and his siblings, can he prove to T.I. that he does in fact have the creative chops to succeed? Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: With T.I.'s uncle Crow getting older, Tip sets out to help him check off items on his bucket list, including jello wrestling! Harris is pranking everyone, causing confusion as the family begins to question one another. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: King and Zonnique want to be baptized, but Major joining quickly comes to a halt when he reveals a phobia to water. This leaves Tiny to try and help her son overcome his fear. Tip prepares his old, family-friend Crow for a first date. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Major asks his pops for help on a school project. But then the Harris family gets too involved. Meanwhile, King writes a children's book and presents it to the toughest audience: kids. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. & Tiny introduce athletics into Major's life as an alternative to video games. T.I. presents 3 very different sports for Major to try. Tiny meets with a social-media comedian who has more than just a meeting in store for her. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: With the passing of her nephew, Tiny, her mom, and Zonnique meet with a medium. However, the medium reveals more than Niq Niq would like. With his oldest boys not paying attention, T.I devises a plan that will scare the boys straight. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tameka makes an effort to find fun, aerobic activities for herself, Zonnique, Ms. Diane and Precious. In an effort to prevent his boys from damaging his home, T.I. arranges stunt classes for the kids at a local stunt school. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: The kids come to T.I. for spending money, and he encourages them to find another way. The Harris kids decide to have a garage sale. Zonnique's faced with the challenge of her first solo music video. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I.'s comedian sidekick, K-Dubb exploits an opportunity to trade his silence about a broken vase for miscellaneous favors. Tiny and her longtime friend, Toya are challenged to a lip-sync battle by their adolescent daughters. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In this season finale, Tameka makes an epic reveal to the family, that will change all of their lives forever! Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Cap'n Dilly and the Cadets build a Pirate Playzone in Ker-Splash Canyon; the Dodos think Brody is the legendary Dodo King and do whatever he says until Baddy McBat takes the crown.

programme.desc: While the cadets work on their snowboarding badge, a falling tree knocks a gondola loose; the Cadets help Davey Hasselhawg give the little Turkskis a swim lesson, and then have to rescue Davey from a whirlpool.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: When Sandy Stork loses her glasses and mixes up the eggs in her delivery, Top Wing races to get the right eggs back home before they hatch; Chomps and Rocco take Big Swirl's famous pearls.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: The Cadets send stressed Shirley on a remote treetop cabin vacation when she accidentally unmoors the cabin; Baddy wants to be in Reg Goosling's best adventure picture ever, but the Cadets rescue Baddy and end up in the picture instead.

programme.desc: Penny's friend Salty asks Team Top Wing for help after Penny becomes trapped rescuing his old boat; Rod tries to earn three jump badges in one day.

programme.desc: The Monkey Bandits take Rod's birthday cake and Road-Wing; as Bea helps Brody and Rod earn their Overnight Badge, Baddy McBat tries to scare them, but the Cadets rescue him.

programme.desc: The cadets must pass Inspector Eagle-Eye's test, or Speedy and Bea will be sent back to teacher's school; Team Top Wing aces the test and rescues the inspector using the Headquarters Command Flyer, a part of the HQ that can fly.
